instruction: rotate the cube till the green face upward

response.reasoning: From the camera view, the cube’s top is blue and the green square is showing on one of the vertical faces instead of the top or bottom.

The final images show the top face as yellow, so the green face is clearly one of the sides of the cube.
From the final observation, the top face is not green (it appears blue or possibly yellow/red). The visible green squares remain on one of the side faces of the cube.
